Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier track condition near Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier track condition near Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to a track condition.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Harlem-bound Green Line trains have been re-routed to the Inner Loop. Board Harlem-bound Green Line trains on the Orange Line platform side. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
